Classes in pl.bristleback.server.bristle.conf.resolver.init that implement InitialConfigurationResolver
 class DefaultConfigurationResolver
          This class provides default Bristleback Server configuration, that can be used in application without any modifications.
 class PojoConfigResolver
          This configuration resolver simply contains setter methods for each configuration setting.
 class PropertiesFileConfigResolver
          This configuration resolver uses Properties file to retrieve configuration elements.
